title: Tumbleweeds
subject_group: Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Teenage girls
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Teenage girls
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Puberty
abstract: The trials of a young couple facing teenage pregnancy
description: A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival. An dramatic look at the trouble faced by a teenage couple. The girl finds out that she is pregnant and has decided to give it up for adoption. The boy still loves her and they must face making the final decision together.
